documentation.title: KoolUploader Class [PHP]
documentation.metadescription: KoolUploader is amazing PHP Ajax File Upload with Real-Time Progress Tracking capability. This is an art of power and simplicity.
documentation.metakeywords: php ajax file upload, php upload progress, ajax file upload

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: Get or set the id for KoolUploader.
property.longdesc: Get or set the id for KoolUploader. This id will be use as variable name of KoolUploader at client-side.
property.samplecode: <?php $kul->id="kul";//We usuall use the same id name with server-side for better reference. ?>

property.name: styleFolder
property.shortdesc: Get or set folder which contain css style for KoolUploader.
property.longdesc: Get or set folder which contain css style for KoolUploader.

property.name: scriptFolder
property.shortdesc: Get or set folder which contain core file "kooluploader.php".
property.longdesc: Get or set folder which contain core file "kooluploader.php". Normally the path to script folder is automatically added, however in some cases you may need to set it manually.

property.name: width
property.shortdesc: Get or set the width of KoolUploader.
property.longdesc: Get or set the width of KoolUploader.

property.name: height
property.shortdesc: Get or set the height of KoolUploader.
property.longdesc: Get or set the height of KoolUploader.

property.name: handlePage
property.shortdesc: Get or set the page which handle upload request
property.longdesc: Get or set the page which handle upload request

property.name: texts
property.shortdesc: Get or set text for buttons and messages of KooUploader.
property.longdesc: Get or set text for buttons and messages of KooUploader. This array is very useful to customize KoolUploader with your own message and button text.

property.name: progressTracking
property.shortdesc: Get or set whether progress tracking is enabled
property.longdesc: Get or set whether progress tracking is enabled

property.name: updateProgressInterval
property.shortdesc: Get or set number of milisecond KoolUploader will send request to track uploading progress.
property.longdesc: Get or set number of milisecond KoolUploader will send request to track uploading progress.

property.name: showProgressBar
property.shortdesc: Get or set whether the progress bar will be shown
property.longdesc: Get or set whether the progress bar will be shown

property.name: maxFileSize
property.shortdesc: Get or set maximum size (in bytes) of uploading file
property.longdesc: Get or set maximum size (in bytes) of uploading file

property.name: allowedExtension
property.shortdesc: Get or set list of allowed file extensions.
property.longdesc: Get or set list of allowed file extensions.

property.name: uploadedFiles
property.shortdesc: Get the information of uploaded files.
property.longdesc: Get the information of uploaded files. After having done with upload files at client-side, the page is submitted back. The information of all uloaded files will be posted back as well. When KoolUploader object initiates, Those information will be extracted and saved into uploadedFiles property.
property.samplecode:
<?php 
	//Information of the files that have been uploaded will be saved in uploadedFiles 
	foreach($kul->uploadedFiles as $file) 
	{ 
		echo $file["name"]." ".$file["type"]." ".$file["size"]; 
	} 
?>
